biotools.summary: The Network Seriation and Modularization package takes an edge-list representation of a network as an input, performs network seriation and modularization analysis, and generates as files that can be used as an input for the one-dimensional network visualization tool NetGestalt or other network analysis.

bioschemas.name: NetSAM
bioschemas.summary: The Network Seriation and Modularization package takes an edge-list representation of a network as an input, performs network seriation and modularization analysis, and generates as files that can be used as an input for the one-dimensional network visualization tool NetGestalt or other network analysis.
